item.title: 2016 Burning Man - Black Rock Lighthouse Service
item.description: Involvement Budgeting Short and sweet: Lighting/Electrical budget was stated for $13k, due to the proliferation of Alibaba and using standardized electrical products, the final budget came in right around $7k. Lighting design lead Preliminary ideas required four main rotating lights, with sconces around the exterior of the structures to illuminate the outside. For the main light a discontinued ‘Space Cannon II’ DMX controlled spotlight was donated to the project from someone in the community.

item.title: 2015 Burning Man - Dreamland
item.description: A whimsical experience of vivid colors, dazzling light and flames transport participants to the world of spectacle and the carnivalesque. Photo: Duncan Rawlinson from Flavio Lemelle on Vimeo. Involvement Electro/Mechanical design In order to pass both electricity and propane through the central spire’s hub, I designed a joint consisting of a rotary fluid union and an electrical slip ring. This design allowed for up to: 200cfm of propane and 25A @120VAC.
